page.title: 02Dores/Abriachan_Nessie(1)
page.content: The{Loch Ness Monster }is supposed to be one of the following,Gould's Giant Newt,Plesiosaur,Dinsdale's Monster,Holiday's Great Orm,Costello's Long-Necked Seal,Mackal's Giant Amphibian and Scott and Rine's Nessiteras rhombopteryx.Of course the Monster may be none of these but something completely different or it may only be one of these things,a rock,a seal,alog,an up turned boat or an otter or something else.The monster (for example a plesiosaur)probably would be extinct by now , so how was it preserved.In the Ice Age it may have been caught in the ice so it was preserved in ice ,but this is only one explanation there could be hundreds of other explanations.On the other hand it may not have been frozen in the ice,there may be others of this kind of animal,this is only one mystery.
